description: Comprehensive README update with all features and improvements.
Restore Top 3 Incident Types card and update README.
Update CurrentEvent component with crowd management descriptions and improve UI layout.
Improve dashboard layout and add weather card - Reorganize stats, add dynamic weather display, improve subscriptions.
Add Save All button to callsign assignment page with Supabase persistence and update logic.
Show support act times in event schedule and display up to 5 upcoming timings.
Enhanced company management system with improved UI and data model.
Improve analytics page and implement responsive navigation.
Improve mobile responsiveness and incident table UI.
ProfileCard popup now appears as dropdown below profile photo, full size, always inside screen.
Major UI/UX Improvements: AI Chat, Notifications, and Enhanced Formatting.
Polish login page UI, improve CTA flow, restore solid blue background, and enhance accessibility.
Professional mobile UX for chat FAB, input bar, and keyboard handling.
Align messages by sender (current user right, others left) and show avatars/names from Supabase profiles.
Show all logs except attendance logs in chronological order at end of event report.
Implement Supabase save logic for callsign assignments and roles per event.
Add 'Fight' to incident types and ensure Showdown quick action and time extraction logic are present.
Add comprehensive feature documentation for inCommand system.
